title: Chhandamtu ngilnei chuan
lyrics:
Chhandamtu ngilnei chuan,
I chakna a te e,
Ngaihven la, tawngtai rawh,
Chakna i lo hmu ang.

Ka bat zawng zawng chu,
Isuan min tlaksak;
Ka sualna zawng zawngte nen,
Aman a tleng fai ang.

Lalpa ka hmu ngei mai,
I chakna leh theihna,
Thinlung sak tinemin,
Rilru a tithianghlim.

Khawngaihna chang turin,
Thatna ka nei si lo;
Krista thisen hlu a,
Ka inbual hma hi chuan.

Ka thlarau a tho vang;
Thihna hmun ata chu;
Isuan a tlan zo tawh,
Vanah a hruai zel an g.

Tin, lalthuthleng hmaa,
Thiama ka din hunin,
Chhandamtu ngilnei chuan,
Lallukhum min pe ang
